title: President phones family of martyred ICT Police official
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 26 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Wednesday telephoned the family of the Islamabad Police official who martyred in an attack which took place in sector G-8 of the capital city recently.
He expressed condolence with the bereaved family of constable Munawar Hussain.
The president also interacted with the grieved family of the Pakistan Army soldier Sarfaraz Ali who martyred in an attack on a check post in Bannu on January 13.
He paid tribute to the sacrifices of the martyred soldiers, prayed for peace of the departed souls and strength to their respective families to bear the loss.
